3GPP TS 23.040 V5.1.0 [9.2.3.15]

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum ShortMessageStatus::Reason
 

Enumerator:
SmDelivered  Short message received by the SME (Short Message Entity).
SmDeliveredButUnableToConfirm  Short message forwarded by the SC (Service Center) to the SME but the SC is unable to confirm delivery.
SmReplaced  Short message replaced by the SC.
ReservedReason 
ServiceCenterSpecificReason  Values specific to each SC.
Congestion 
SmeBusy 
NoResponseFromSme 
ServiceRejected 
QualityOfServiceNotAvailable 
ErrorInSme 
RemoteProcedureError 
IncompatibleDestination 
ConnectionRejectedBySme 
NotObtainable 
NoInterworkingAvailable 
SmValidityPeriodExpired 
SmDeletedByOriginatingSme 
SmDeletedByScAdministration 
SmDoesNotExist  The service center has no longer knowledge of a previous existing short message.
InvalidReason 

enum ShortMessageStatus::Status
 

describes the status of a previously submitted SMS-SUBMIT and certain SMS-COMMANDs for which a Status-Report has been requested.

Enumerator:
TransactionCompleted  Short message transaction completed.
TemporaryErrorStillTrying  Temporary error, SC (Service Center) still trying to transfer SM (Short Message).
PermanentError  Permanent error, SC is not making any more transfer attempts.
TemporaryError  Temporary error, SC is not making any more transfer attempts.
ReservedStatus  Reserved values.
InvalidStatus
